items.title: Syrian army orders evacuations as heavy fighting grips Aleppo's Kurdish areas
items.summary: Jan 8 (Reuters) - The Syrian army ‌clashed with fighters from the Kurdish-led Syrian Democratic Forces (SDF) in parts of Aleppo on Thursday and ‌ordered residents to evacuate, accusing the SDF of using Kurdish-majority areas to launch attacks, according ‌to Syrian state media. items.title: Bluetti launches Alternator & Solar dual DC Charger 2 + bundles from CES 2026 with up to 48% exclusive savings from $332
items.summary:
Coinciding and launching from CES 2026, Bluetti is now offering its brand new on-the-go charging solution alongside several bundle options and even exclusive savings for our readers. Things kick-off with the standalone Alternator & Solar Dual DC Charger 2 at $331.55 shipped, after using the exclusive code ELECTREK5OFF at checkout for an additional 5% savings. This all-new unit will fetch $599 after these initial discounts settle, with this not only being the first chance to save, but using our code scores you $17 more savings than you’d normally get. All-in-all, you’re looking at a combined $267 markdown that sets the bar for future discounts throughout the New Year – and don’t forget all the additional bundle options to also score power stations, solar panels, and more with it, which you can find below.

This collection would normally run you $3,499 without any discounts, with today’s rate having only been beaten out by the two drops to $1,599 and the one-time $1,444 low from Black Friday. You can pick it all up here for your nomadic lifestyle with $1,885 savings, dropping it to the third-lowest price we have tracked. Of course, if you only need the power station, you can get that standalone unit down at $1,099 shipped right now.
